ProjectTitle: A testing platform for 4D-XCT of materials and biological tissues, a software toolbox for image enhancement and processing, and a database of XCT datasets and imaging protocols
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/01/2025
Data: please add the samples/materials that you will use in the data table, these are regarded as physical data within the context of a DMP. Additionally, in the subsequent questions, please describe how you will document, store, preserve, and share these materials. 
Ethics: please add the ethical approval numbers that cover the work in this project. 
Preservation: does your project include clinical trials with medicinal products for human use or other clinical experiments on humans; if so please add this in the ethics section, if not relevant, please remove this part from preservation.
label: good with suggestions
